body_html:
DIRS is actually the interface inc, which also contains other dirs like python header path.
Take a look at these 3 lines:

https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L87
https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L95
https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L97

body:
`DIRS` is actually the interface inc, which also contains other dirs like python header path.
Take a look at these 3 lines:

https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L87
https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L95
https://github.com/pybind/pybind11/blob/534b756cb3244aca959359c07d44e4fed3498ba8/tools/pybind11Config.cmake.in#L97
